attributes.action: Limit the times fireworks can be used & where they can be used
attributes.additional_details:
Make more rules and make in an arrestable offence to let of fireworks outside these hours or in the street.

Limit the sale of ones that make too much noise
attributes.background:
Ban fireworks from being let off continuously on certain days - limit their usage to certain times and certain locations - i.e. ban from being let off in the street.
Limit the decibels of fireworks being sold to the public - allow ones that flash, but not ones that bang

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure when and where you'd like fireworks not to be used.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590838
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599451
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595560
